Package com.what2see.controller.user

Class ConversationController

java.lang.Object
com.what2see.controller.user.ConversationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/conversation") public class ConversationController extends Object
Controller for conversions and messages endpoints

    getById(Long conversationId, Long guideId, Long userId)
    Get a specific conversation (if already started) by its id or, indirectly, by guide id (only for tourists).

    Send a message in an existing conversation.
    It is intended to only be used by one of the conversation participants (tourist or guide).
    Note that Message.direction boolean is automatically set, based on the requesting user role.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ConversationResponseDTO>> getAll(@RequestHeader("Authentication") Long userId)
      Get all conversations of the requesting user (tourist or guide)
      Parameters:
      userId - requesting user (must be a tourist or a guide)
      Returns:
      list of conversations (DTO alternative without info about messages for performance reasons)
      See Also:
      • ConversationResponseDTO.messages

    • getById

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ConversationResponseDTO> getById(@RequestParam(required=false) Long conversationId, @RequestParam(required=false) Long guideId, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long userId)
      Get a specific conversation (if already started) by its id or, indirectly, by guide id (only for tourists).
      It is intended to only be used by one of the conversation participants (tourist or guide).
      Parameters:
      conversationId - conversation to get or
      guideId - guide to get conversation with (only for tourists)
      userId - requesting user (must be a tourist or a guide and one of the conversation participants)
      Returns:
      wanted conversation or empty response if not started yet
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.UNAUTHORIZED if user is not authorized to see the wanted conversation

    • startConversation

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ConversationResponseDTO> startConversation(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid ConversationCreateDTO c, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long touristId)
      Start a new conversation with a guide.
      It is intended to only be used by tourists and only if the conversation has not been already started.
      Parameters:
      c - conversation to start with at least one message
      touristId - requesting tourist
      Returns:
      created conversation
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST if conversation has been already started

    • sendMessage

      @PostMapping("/message") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponseDTO> sendMessage(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid MessageCreateDTO m, @RequestHeader("Authentication") Long userId)
      Send a message in an existing conversation.
      It is intended to only be used by one of the conversation participants (tourist or guide).
      Note that Message.direction boolean is automatically set, based on the requesting user role.
      Parameters:
      m - message to send (including conversation id)
      userId - requesting user (must be a tourist or a guide and one of the conversation participants)
      Returns:
      created message
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.server.ResponseStatusException - HttpStatus.UNAUTHORIZED if user is not authorized to send a message in the wanted conversation
